item.title: Best Python Tricks in Jupyter Notebook
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: Introduction Python is a popular programming language for its simplicity and readability. When it is combined with Jupyter Notebook, it offers interactive experimentation, documentation of code and data. This article discusses Python tricks in Jupyter Notebook to enhance coding experience, productivity, and understanding. Keyboard shortcuts, magic commands, interactive widgets, and visualization tools can streamline workflow […]
item.content:encoded:

item.title: How to Transition your Career from Non Tech Field to Generative AI?
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: Introduction In today’s rapidly evolving world, the term ‘Generative AI’ is on everyone’s lips. Studies reveal that Generative AI is becoming indispensable in the workplace, with the market projected to reach $1.3 trillion by 2032. If you’ve been considering a career transition from a non-tech field to Generative AI, now is the time! This article explores the […]
item.content:encoded:

item.title: How Data Efficient GANs Generate Images of Cats and Dogs?
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: Introduction Generative adversarial networks are a popular framework for Image generation. In this article we’ll train Data-efficient GANs with Adaptive Discriminator Augmentation that addresses the challenge of limited training data. Adaptive Discriminator Augmentation dynamically adjusts data augmentation during GAN training, preventing discriminator overfitting and enhancing model generalization. By employing invertible augmentation techniques and probabilistic application, […]
item.content:encoded:
Introduction Generative adversarial networks are a popular framework for Image generation. In this article we’ll train Data-efficient GANs with Adaptive Discriminator Augmentation that addresses the challenge of limited training data. Adaptive Discriminator Augmentation dynamically adjusts data augmentation during GAN training, preventing discriminator overfitting and enhancing model generalization. By employing invertible augmentation techniques and probabilistic application, […]

The post How Data Efficient GANs Generate Images of Cats and Dogs? appeared first on Analytics Vidhya.

item.title: Flask Application Dockerization: Creating a Docker Image
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: Introduction In the fast-paced software development industry, mastering robust application management and smooth deployment is crucial. Docker, a game-changing technology, has revolutionized software distribution, running, and bundles by separating applications from infrastructure, enabling quick software delivery. It improves portability, scalability, and workflow optimization, making it a standard component in current development practices. This article aims […]
item.content:encoded:
